Their clothes are super cute and I love the style, but unfortunately I have to give a bad review. Every time I‚Äôve been here the customer service is lacking. No one ever greets you, asks if you need a room or are friendly at all. My sister bought a dress here and wore it for a few hours and then the next morning wanted to wear it again, and there was already a hole in it. Cheap quality and bad service, will be skipping it from now on.


I discovered this store today and I absolutely fell in love!  They have great selection and very welcoming, energetic staff ! I‚Äôll be back!


Flavour downstairs has some good selection and reasonable prices. Flavour upstairs (vintage) is an absolute miss. It seems as though their entire collection is based on an 80 year old lady named Geraldine. A lot of the staff seem to embody that, with a general vibe of 'get off my lawn' instead of welcoming customers in. Many items are priced more expensive than their retail price... I'd say stick to downstairs storefront or avoid altogether.


They've done a great job of curating their clothing and the prices are all fair. Really funky clothing and great customer service. I had a really good experience with a girl named Lily who made our day! She was very kind and went out of her way to help us out.


I used to avoid this store because they carry a variety of brands and the sizing can be a bit of a nightmare if you're a curvier person like me.

The staff that are at this location now are very laid-back and approachable people. I really enjoyed my last visit and bought a gift for a friends birthday, and was pleasantly surprised when the sales associate helped me wrap the earrings and ensure it was "gift ready".

If you like cute clothes in various styles, definitely check this place out!

name: Gap
reviews:
Large bright Gap store with additional children's clothing area. Adult clothing selection is generally casual, socks to hats, and everything in between. Children's clothing has a selection of both dressy and casual with the addition of seasonal shoes. Staff are courteous and friendly, recommended.


Staff are always eager to help you.
Friendly people. ( Ask for Ava )
Prices are fair.
Very clean and spacious place.


Very friendly staff. Lots of discounts.


Definitely one of my favorite brands. Good quality. I love their baby clothes, winter pants and jackets and all the pajamas. This store in very well located. There are special sales during the year. The only thing is the service that can be improved.  Otherwise, is all good. I do recommend.


It's a GAP store with the nicest staff in town.

name: Four Horsemen Shop
editorial_summary: Unadorned shop featuring trendy young men's pants, shirts & outerwear in a simple space.
reviews:
I‚Äôm not the target demographic for this store, but the staff was super friendly and helpful. I was just looking for a new comfort hoody. The guys even recommended another place to check out. Checked out the other store but in the end came back here and bought a nice hoody.


Yeah it's expensive but you get what you pay for. Amazing selection of brands and helpful staff definitely the place to go after a big pay day.


Entitled ownership and management that do not display in a clear and visible manner anywhere in their store, the fact that they do not do cash refunds. During my attempt at a return for a refund I reminded the cashier that I asked my salesperson during the purchase about a return, and was told that it was. Management then comes to explain to you that what his salesperson really meant the day before was - that a return is never for your hard earned cash back, but rather for this stores small print tucked away hidden policy of an in-store credit only. Poor!

Four Horseman Management - Your reply to my review is a joke!
Your attempt at trying to falsely flip the narrative and remove the focus of my NEGATIVE review from your HIDDEN no cash refund policy - to false claims about my behaviour is insulting to all those who read reviews. Your character in this regard only further undermines your business practices & credibility - from boutique to garage sale - buyer be ware!


The staff are always so nice and helpful, even if you are not buying anything. They prices can be high, but the quality of the items is as good as it gets. Everything is always clean and organized. It is much nicer then most other clothing stores.


I walked into the shop this summer on a mission to dress better and improve me style. The staff always has good feedback and knowledge if what they are selling. Were its from, where it's made, history if the company. Makes dressing an experience. Props.

name: Straith's Fine Clothing
reviews:
The finest mens clothing store in Victoria by far. The selection and service is 5 star . Do not miss this store on your adventures through life.
The brothers are amazing and of course give the full customer experience expected ! When I wear the clothing from this store I know I look and feel my best .     :)


Highly recommend, always!
I feel so cared for when shopping at Straith‚Äôs and end up with something special every time.

Someone once told me this, and I believe it to be true:‚ÄúYou can never look too good. If someone feels underdressed, that‚Äôs their problem.‚Äù


Been in here many times. Really good suits and clothing for that special occasion or just gifts for friends & family. The one guy who helped me manny is really knowledgeable and handsome.


Beautiful selection of fine men‚Äôs clothing. Best in class customer experience. 10/10 recommendation if you‚Äôre looking for a new suit or to update your wardrobe


A must-stop whenever I'm in town. Unbeatable selection for any occasion. Easily the best in Victoria for what they do, if not Canada.

name: Little Blue House Victoria
reviews:
Kiran and Angel were amazing, I mean literally amazing.. they greeted me as I came in the store even as they were busy at the till with other people. The helped me look for sizes and sale items I was looking for, went to the back multiple times to help me find the right size. It‚Äôs not often you seen people go so out of their way to help you with such patients and kindness. They were constantly helping everyone or steaming the pyjamas or organizing.. 10/10 on the customer service and also just a great representation of the store.. not only is the clothing super quality, I would go back just to support these women! Thank You Girls!


Quality, well made clothing and great styles! Karin gave me great service‚Ä¶ordered the items I wanted and called when they arrived so I could pick up..all in a timely fashion!  Wonderful shop!


I bought a rain coat and rain pants for my 2 year old but the next day I realized the items didn‚Äôt work with rain boots that would properly fit her.

Refunds are not available at this store and it was overly complicated to exhange items.

That said the cloths themselves are pretty good quality.


Great customer service! The 2 ladies working Dec 21/22 were incredibly helpful, kind and patient while  helping me find the perfect gifts. Thank you for your help!


A very professional staff who support me getting winter gears for my kids. I was in a rush to buy them and they were so fast to get me the size and styles I wanted.
I really appreciated the services and will be going back soon to shop for myself.
Well done Team Hatley Governments St

name: Complex Clothing
reviews:
Complex brings big city streetwear products and atmosphere to the Island with no compromise. I never thought I would find such a great selection of sneakers when I moved to the Island. They have kept it real since 1998 and it shows, great shop.


i went to complex today looking to get some shoes.

the staff were very nice and helpful there was a big selection of shoes to pic from. overall the staff were very nice pretty good prices definitely recommend


Apologies for giving you poor rating, product was better but customer handling could have been better.
I bought Nike Jordan last week along with Nike tees, was greeted & treated very well, appreciated during my first visit.

I decided to exchange my tees after couple of days of my visit, so I visited the showroom and was greeted by one of Employees and I handed over the tees and told her I want to exchange, poor experience started from
here.
She straight away said it‚Äôs not from this store I can‚Äôt exchange, one of your staff went back to check the stock and confirmed it‚Äôs from this store and I was kind of laughing, then she asked for Tag which I had but not along with Tees, had bill which they gave me, I think it was paid receipt, for actual bill copy I gave them my email Id on my first visit but I didn‚Äôt get my receipt on my email Id.
But then she asked for Bill, so I shown her that copy which I had and even while checking that receipt she said it‚Äôs not from
our store, I still had smile on my face( Awkward one), then after checking the name of Employee she could make out because she was working at that point of time and then asked when did you bought this stuff, I said last Friday and I visited on Monday, which means after 3 days of purchase, she was like, it‚Äôs been more than a week so we can‚Äôt exchange it‚Äôs in our policy and shown me their policy then I had to clarified, ‚Äú I took 3 days ago, last Friday.
Then she asked for email Bill which I didn‚Äôt received, but after checking my Junk finally I got my bill and was able to exchange and then I bought another Tees in exchange paid the difference, she took my almost 5-10 mins in all that conversation.
After the billing I left the store without even realizing that security Tag wasn‚Äôt removed by the cashier, on which she has to call me back even when I was few steps away from store one of their staff came and informed me about the Tag, which actually beep while I was exiting but I didn‚Äôt even realized that it still had Tag.

She was rude, she assumed I am here to ask for a refund and trying to be a fake customer even without realizing and hearing my concern she predetermined everything, I was like, this is how you treat you customer who comes for return or refund.

I visited on dated 15th May around 2pm, just hope your staff may learn some basic etiquette and few customer handling skills could have been better for the brand, predetermining everything could have been worse at times.
She spoiled the day.


This is the perfect place to shop street wear in Victoria. Staff there are really kind and helpful. I really love the ‚Äúone pair of shoes for one household‚Äùrule when new shoes drop. It gives everyone equal chance to get the shoes for retail price. That‚Äôs really considerate. I‚Äôll definitely go there all the time.


I‚Äôve passed this place for a number of years and been in a few times. A strong selection of streetwear, and a excellent curation of the latest trends. I‚Äôm no sneakerhead but I was looking for a leather upper with the classic ‚Äògum‚Äô sole. I asked the staff ‚Äúwhat dictates your colour selection‚Äù as I was looking for a particular colour. Instead of asking ‚Äúwhat are you looking for‚Äù or ‚Äúcan I help you find something in particular‚Äù I was sassed hard with ‚Äúwhat you see is what we have‚Äù.  Retail customers are hard to please, I get it. But c‚Äômon sister! A little kindness goes a long way.  All was redeemed as another gentlemen helped me try on a couple sets of kicks and after some camaraderie, he certainly helped me make that ‚Äúpurchase decision‚Äù.

name: Meraki
reviews:
DO NOT ENTER IF YOUR WAIST IS LARGER THAN 30"

I walked past your store about 2 months ago and loved the jeans that I saw. I thought finally stylish/flattering shapes and good quality denim for a reasonable price. I spent the past 2 months saving up my tips to buy a pair of jeans for work. Today I  was so excited to go buy one pair. I tried one on and 30 was just a bit too small so I asked if there were any 32s or 34s and no your brand doesn't even make jeans that big. I was so embarrassed and disappointed. It sent me Into a very bad place with my self image I actually couldn't hold back tears as I left the store. Please keep in mind that this is not normal for me, I have a very good self image that I've worked hard for after years of body dysmorphia and eating disorders. everyone in my life makes me feel good about myself .  But after leaving your store I immediately felt like I need to loose weight even though I'm a completely normal and common size. This should have never happened in a store like yours. Please please please pass on this message to someone who is in charge of ordering inventory. You need to be more size inclusive!
Alternatively have a sign on the door that says "do not enter if your waist is larger than 30 inches"
Because seeing that would have been so much less painful for me.


Has always been a favourite local boutique of mine, and many treasured pieces from Meraki grace my closet. When you can catch a sale there, you better believe it‚Äôs a bomb deal, too! Tonight, my aunt, who was visiting me from up island, and I popped our heads in shortly after the store closed (Good Friday, we were unsure..). The owner, Kylie, was kind enough to let us in anyway, to have a little shop around. It meant a lot because my aunt needed a couple cool pieces and she doesn‚Äôt make it to Victoria to shop all that frequently. Kylie, thank you for being so accommodating and staying a bit late for us tonight‚Ä¶ it did not go unnoticed! We will be back, as always.


I purchased some shoes here and when I got home I noticed a small rip in the leather. When I brought these shoes back the next day, I was greeted by Lauren. She was most accommodating and apologetic. She offered me numerous solutions to the problem, giving me the option of what would suit me best. I was very impressed with the customer service Lauren provided and the knowledge she had of the brands they carry. I highly recommend this shopping experience.


Poorly managed boutique with low service standards. They shipped out a pair of sunglasses to me without making sure the correct pair were in the box. Now they state they are no longer in stock, even though they are still on their website. Get a grip on your inventory! I do not recommend.


This boutique offers a jaw-dropping selection of precious apparel, which is complimented by a usually warm and friendly staff. However, my appreciation for this store was tarnished by the rudeness of an employee not long ago. I was looking at some shoes and we started to strike up a conversation. She seemed friendly until she asked if I'd like the shoe in my size and I jokingly said "No" and started to explain why. However, upon saying "No", she immediately turned on her heel and walked away from me. She then made a rather theatrical point of refusing to look at me during the remainder of my stay, which I ended promptly. This snobbish behaviour made me feel extremely embarrassed and uncomfortable. Most of the staff are great so I will be back, just not for a while.

name: Chai Fashions
reviews:
Loved this store!! I'm Caucasian, but was raised with a heavy Indian influence, and I fell in love with this store! The ladies are so sweet, and give great, honest recommendations. I'm finally able to find indian-inspired clothing that isn't necessarily a sari. Definitely going to be ordering online, as I live in central Alberta lol. The fabrics are gorgeous, and I love all the different styles of shirts, kraftans, dresses, pants, and skirts. Please visit if you love this style of clothing!! If you have trouble with sizing, please try things on to make sure you like how things fit.


Staff were lovely and this rating in no way reflects them. I was delighted to receive a pair of beautiful silk pyjamas for Christmas, but upon wear they completely fell apart at the seams. My mother thought the $120 price tag would have inferred a higher quality, and we are both incredibly disappointed by this outcome. This was my first product from this store and it will likely be my last. I'm sorry to leave a bad review, but this was super not cool.


I tripped across this store on a recent trip to Victoria, and I had to write it a great review. It is in the mall that has the Hudson Bay as the anchor store. The fabrics are beautiful and the patterns are very boho-chic. I am always intimidated going into new clothing stores, as I am 5'4" and have a big bust, which makes it hard to find clothes that fit, and I often leave disappointed. The sales gals were so friendly and explained that they are cut for real women (not just skinny model types) and so I tried on a few pieces. To my delight- they fit! They have maxi-dresses that aren't sooo long that they drag on the floor even with heels, which was a super-bonus. I bought two! That night I wore one out and my friend loved my dress so much I went back and got one for her as a gift. I will definitely will be back on my next visit! P.S. to the store owner- your sales gals are adorable and doing a great job!


This is my new favourite store. I bought five of their Gaby dresses because I loved the cut and how it looked on me, so I got as many patterns as I could afford. I also have one of their kaftans (made from recycle sari's) which is beautiful. I get all sorts of compliments on the kaftan, and I love how it is so forgiving on my post-partum figure. I also got one of their camel leather belts which is incredibly resilient (and the story behind how they are sourced is amazing). I am looking forward to one day buying a kantha quilt from them. The staff are incredibly helpful and super friendly, they gave me just the right amount of tips and tricks to make the fashion work for me.


High quality work with an original flair. While the majority of my closet is Chai and I have been shopping there regularly since 2015, I gave 4 stars simply because the clothing doesn‚Äôt accommodate large breasts. Even though a medium would be most appropriate to my build I often have to buy L/xl to go over my chest and then belt the waist.

name: FOLK
editorial_summary: Local, urban boutique with a minimalist vibe carrying casualwear & accessories for women.
reviews:
Recently checked out this store for the first time while visiting Victoria with a friend. Lots of very cute minimalist pieces and a very pretty store overall. The main reason for my review is that the woman helping me was so fun and outgoing. I didn‚Äôt catch her name but she made my experience so amazing; I‚Äôve never felt so good going clothing shopping before! This woman is definitely an asset to the business and a natural salesperson.


Folk is the best clothing store in Victoria -- hands down. The quality is excellent and the items are carefully selected for their aesthetic and clean silhouettes. As a busy, small-business owner, I don't have a lot of time to get dressed in the morning so I appreciate that anything I get at Folk I can throw on in the morning and instantly look professional, stylish and put together. I'm surprised to see people complain about prices -- as an adult, you look at a price tag and willingly walk to the cashier to buy something. If items are available in other places, i.e. online, posted prices often do not reflect shipping and customs, which can quickly jack up the price. (This recently happened to me with a jacket I bought online, and it increased the price of the jacket by 35%. In hindsight, I wished I had given that money to a local business instead of Canada Customs.) Additionally, the prices at other places do not reflect their culture. Buying something online to cut costs can mean that employees on that end are paid minimum wages, whereas at Folk the employees are local people with good jobs and happy smiling faces. If I want a $6 t-shirt, I'll go to H&M where my stepson shops. In the meantime, I'm a business professional and plan to continue giving to local businesses and looking fly while I do it. A pic of my favourite tunic is attached, which I got at Folk and for which people stop me on the street to ask where I got it every. single. time.


Walked in here thinking I wouldn‚Äôt find anything as I wear plus size. The woman working, who I‚Äôm assuming isthe owner, was immediately so warm, friendly, and personable. I pulled a pair of gorgeous linen pants on to try and she had me give her a little fashion show, it made me feel so special. She brought me so many other cute vintage and non vintage plus size pieces to try and was SO attentive. I felt like I was shopping with a friend. The other staff members were just as kind and sweet!

This shop is amazing and also so well curated and gorgeous. I highly recommend checking it out, even if it‚Äôs just so the very nice pretty ladies working there can share their positive energy with you. It really made my day and now I have a well made pair of pants I‚Äôll probably have for the rest of my life.

Thank you guys for making my day!!


Bought an amazing vintage Escada dress here and I must say I
loved the vibe of the new location. Felt very warm and inviting. The owner Willow was super fun and very helpful and I felt very looked after as a client. It‚Äôs hard to find exceptional customer service these days and I felt the owner was beyond exceptional and that a lot of private stores in Victoria could learn from her example. Thank you again for an awesome shopping experience and a fabulous dress!


LOVE the vibe of this beautiful shop. The owner and all her staff are pure magic. Its incredible to walk into such an amazing space, and get this? THEY ACTUALLY SAY HI TO YOU WHEN YOU ENTER!! So important in my opinion. I love the mixture of vintage clothes, what a smart idea. The owner is always a dream to speak too, and AWAKE non the less. Which in these "fake woke" days is VERY HARD to come by. I will absolutely be back and so looking forward to the next time....ALSO, what is with people complaining about no refunds? lol what planet do you live on that you think refunds are just given to you by a small business, IT'S ALWAYS IN STORE CREDIT. So stop your btchin' trolls, these woman are incredible. If you don't dig where the clothes are made, stop trolling and kindly shop elsewhere. Needed to get that off my chest as BULLY'S and me DO. NOT. VIBE. I will absolutely be back

name: Designer's International
reviews: Thank you for resolving our issue.

name: Bellissima / Serena West
reviews:
Belissima has been my go-to place for many years. The staff is exceptional and I love the fashion. I have been a loyal customer for over 20 years. I also love that you sell Canadian products.


I so enjoy going in to this store - Serena West (formerly Bellissima) in Mayfair shopping centre - Victoria BC. Marnie is so helpful and delightful - in fact all the staff I have encountered have been friendly, knowledgeable and professional; I never feel that I am "being stalked" by assistants as I do in other ladies fashion stores. Prices are reasonable too. Highly recommend a browse.


Rude and pretentious employees. I had gone in to look for a top for a family member a little while back and decided not to buy from there after my experience with the two female employees.

One of the ladies behind the counter kept sighing, rolling her eyes, and exchanging judging looks with the other employee out of nowhere. As I browsed the tops, the other hovered extremely close to me through the whole store as if I were going to steal. That same lady made some sly unsolicited comment about how I may not be able to find anything within my price range, despite me not ever mentioning my budget.

I am by all means not a dirty, sketchy-looking person, nor was I rude at any point in time so it was all so absolutely confusing as to why they were treating me like that right from the get-go. All I did was walk in, say hi, then keep to myself as I looked through the tops. I've had a friend and another family member share similar experiences here as well. Weird and disappointing.


My wife likes this store. They have good sales. Also Canadian made dresses etc. Staff seem really helpful and knowledgeable.


If you want to wear something that no one else has,  and if money's no object,  then this is a Don't Miss It stop on your shopping trip.

name: The Latest Scoop Mayfair
reviews:
They had some really cute and neat products but their customer service was very disappointing. I walked up to the till to check out. The girl at the till was staring at her laptop so I said hi and put the item on the counter but she completely ignored me. I waited few seconds to see if she‚Äôll take her eyes off the screen or at least say something like ‚Äúcould you hold for a sec‚Äù  but nope. Really wanted to purchase a gift for my friend but couldn‚Äôt because the cashier didn‚Äôt feeling like working. ‚Ä¶what is happening?


This place is great for some interesting finds however very pricey. Staff are always very nice and helpful!


Love this store, the people working there are so helpful and kind, especially Penelope!


Love this store!!! Home wear and fashion!! Chef's kiss ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Pom Pom Boutique-All Things Lovely
reviews:
I loved my shopping experience here! Super nice stuff, and Natalie was extremely helpful - suggested how to pair items and accessorize. I will definitely be going back.


Shop at PomPom in Victoria for the most lovely fashion pieces for women. The owners are very fashion savvy are very careful shoppers. Small orders from high fashion places, styles and clothes for the fashionistas and the smart career-girls. They will help you choose the best outfits for you and your body, they love colour and flair and style and fashion and they love to create outfits for every conceivable occasion. I keep a keen eye on their instagram profile and their websites so I can snap up anything that catches my eye‚Ä¶blink and it is gone.


I stumbled upon this amazing shop while on vacation in Victoria with a girlfriend and boy was I in for a treat! The owner was super friendly and full of life, helpful and very fashion-savvy. I got two beautiful dresses and a gorgeous jacket, I will definitely be back again!


Calling all tall girls!! There ARE dresses for you here! I had such a wonderful shopping experience here between stumbling upon a beautiful dress for a wedding, and receiving outstanding service from the person working here. Keep up the good work!


This is such a cute store, with really lovely dresses.  They're reasonably priced and the lady that runs the store is super sweet and helpful, grabbing sizes and recommending things.

I don't live in Victoria but I saw a dress I liked on their Facebook page and it was out of stock. Not only did the owner order more of the dresses, but she offered to mail one to me as soon as the new stock arrived.  The dress arrived less than 1 day after I ordered it!  Beyond impressed with the level of service :)

name: Cleo Hillside Centre
reviews:
some lovely work & leisure clothes  well -made, a little expensive but frequent good sales


Amazing customer service! The staff here make my shopping experience a pleasant one.


The staff here make the shipping experience much more enjoyable.


Received excellent service from a kind and attentive clerk. Not that common these days. Also it was a great sale.


Nice selection,good price.
Betty has great customers service. Thank you.

name: Suzy Shier | Le Ch√¢teau
reviews:
One of the worst experience in this location the Bay center today on Boxing day Dec-26-2022.Lady in Suzy Sheir charged me $15 extra on tagged price. I showed them discount label and it was snowing $65 and she charged me $80 and something.I ask for my money return.She can't refund money on my card even it was not my fault and she gave me another gift card.I don't shop here often. I will never recommend this place to anyone.


This location no longer exists. Fun place to shop tho! Lots of clothes to find for super cheap prices. Don't expect the clothes to last more than 3 washes but for the price, and as long as you try stuff on; Fun and worth it!


Thanks to all the staff today at your uptown location. June 26th 2017.
I'm not a girly girl and I have a odd shaped body with curves and rolls. Buying a dress is a nightmare and walking into fancy stores is intimidating. All the dresses wer so adorable and I'm so thrilled I found something. Thank u so much! I'll be returning when I can üòä

name: The Dancing Lily
editorial_summary: Bright, cheerful store carrying a selection of designer & brand-name fashions for men & women.
reviews:
This store is merchandised so beautifully. You want to try everything on. They have lots of beautiful spring colours. Top ladies store in Victoria.


I have always loved the selection that Dancing Lily has to offer, I always find several items that I love.  The quality of the product lines are excellent and Lili & staff are very knowledgeable. Customer service is always above and beyond expectations both in person and online.


I adore this boutique! I live in Hollywood and I make a point to shop here every time I visit because the owner always has a fantastic selection. I‚Äôm very impressed with the lines she carries,  I recently purchased a pair of Ted Baker shoes and absolutely love them. Great staff and the owner is delightful and very helpful. Overall, a positive experience every time. Wish she had a shop here in LA!!


Went in and got to talk to the owner, she was very helpful without being pushy or overwhelmig and so positive it was contagious! I left with a gorgeous blue dress that I‚Äôve worn multiple times and still love. Will be shopping there again, I Highly recommend and thanks again Miss Dancing Lily!


Beautiful displays and a great range of sizes. Window displays are always so welcoming inviting you in to a warm and friendly atmosphere. The owner, Lil, is herself warm, welcoming and goes above and beyond.

name: Lifestyles west
reviews:
The store and products seem fine, but I had an employee come up and scold my husband like a child for not saying hello to her, when he simply had not heard her. Extremely terrible customer service.


Very unique items, ranging in mid to high price points. Lovely selection and great service.


Looking for local jewelry?  This is the place. Very reasonably priced.

name: Mercedes Lane Too
reviews:
Every good customer service, very friendly.  A good selection of women's clothing, dresses, Up pants, casual and dressy and more. Summer stock is coming in and varied selection.  4 dressing rooms.  I saw several tops I would of purchased that were outside what I have seen anywhere else but only small or very large sizes left.  Good to stop in more often to see the new items. I think they have an avid following.


This unique store has very nice clothing displayed in colour coordinated sections. Although there are a wide range of sizes, there may only be 2 of each size. New clothing arrives regularly so check back from time to time and see what's new.


Excellent customer service and overall great feel to the store (Courtenay). I was shopping for a gift for my wife and was comfortable doing so.


This is my favorite place to shop! You can find wonderful clothes you won't find anywhere else. Something for every woman of any age and size. Staff are wonderful and helpful. I can't recommend this great little women's clothing store more! Check it out, you won't be disappointed


This place has some very unique and wonderful clothing! Super soft fabrics, range of sizes, Vancouver designers and Italian stuff too! Staff is super friendly and helpful. Worth taking the drive to Cook Street if you don't live in the area.

name: Bernstein & Gold
reviews:
I can't say enough great things about Bernstein and Gold. The owner and staff are amazing. They know their products really well,  where they are made and how. They choose products that are made ecologically if they are from abroad and choose local whenever possible. They are expert at choosing the right garment and fit for any occasion or just for casual wear. Claudia and Zoe are the kind of personal service you want in a store. Jamie is an amazing esthetician. I had the best facial I have ever had from her and I have had facials world wide over many years. Incredible team! Thank you!


This is my favourite store in Victoria for clothing and fashion accessories. The staff are always super friendly and helpful plus they educate themselves on the brands and the products they carry. They are selective and pick pieces that are of the best quality, which is honestly hard to come by in a Victoria. They carry brands that you can‚Äôt find elsewhere In the city which is refreshing and a nice change from the other boutiques which carry the exact same products as the store next door and the store next door to that...They still honor shopping local, but they branch out as well.  I love their denim selection! Aside from clothing their jewelry selection is amazing as well! be sure to look at the pieces in store by Lizzie Fortunato!! They have a wonderful selection of spa essentials as well :)


I've been going to Bernstein for my skincare for over a year know. Zo√´ is incredible at knowing exactly what I need to have radiant healthy skin for my very sensitive skin type. She even picked out makeup that was exactly my shade just by looking at a picture. Shipping is immediate and beautify packed. I've never had skin like this before in my life! I'm so happy I found out about this amazing little shop and I couldn't recommend their service more.


I absolutely love this store and it's selection of brands - it is very honestly my go-to store here in Victoria. Claudia and Zoe are so wonderful and their impeccable customer service is rare these days, and something I genuinely appreciate. I will continue to recommend this store to anyone and thank these fabulous ladies for their amazing service and style.


Bernstein is Gold!!!
If you want beautiful clothes and Jewelry that you will love forever this is a girls one stop shop for everything lovely including an amazing skincare line and a dayspa. The prices are great, the products are high quality and cutting edge and the customer care is fabulous. A decadent shopping experience even for a casual window shopper, or simply anyone who loves beautiful things....

name: West 49
reviews:
Got a jacket for Xmas that was bought online but it didn‚Äôt fit. So tried to return it to the Victoria store but they wouldn‚Äôt take it back as the tag was damaged but still attached.  I had the receipt and it clearly states that it can be returned to any store but they still wouldn‚Äôt accept it, they claimed that the barcode on the attached tag was damaged but this is how it was received.  I tried customer service but as it was the weekend it was closed. I took the option of emailing customer service through the w49 website but have not received any response, it‚Äôs been 4 days now and nothing!!

I‚Äôm quite sure I‚Äôm not going to get a response and don‚Äôt expect this store to be in business much longer with such terrible customer service like this.

If you buy anything from this store be sure it fits because if you want to return it, they‚Äôll come up with a lame excuse as to why you can‚Äôt get a refund.

I feel bad for the assistant manager I dealt with as she was clearly new at her job and had no support from her manager or head office, it all starts from the top!!


Love this store, always buy for family here plus the odd sweater and toque for myself.  Nice quality and great customer service.


Nope! Never shopping here again! They won't do refunds with full receipts. All stores I know of will give a refund with full receipt and tags on. Not this one. Bought the wrong hoodie for my daughter.  Now they don't have the same line to replace it. Got a store credit.  There's nothing else she likes so it's useless!
Beware! Once you spend your money here it's gone for good  no matter what!
Nope, never again!


Great prices and selection of trendy shirts, hoodies, skateboards, longboards, scooters and shoes. The store is generally busy and merchandise well displayed. Staff are helpful.


My wife and I ordered a trick scooter on November 27/2020. They did not ship or process our order until the 13 of December. Are you kidding me and you are still in business. Now my daughter will not get her present in time because of an incompetent company. Worst service by any company to date. They really should be ashamed of themselves. 20 days to process and ship is so disrespectful. Pure disappointment and totally rude on a big store like this. Forget this company
